row.process: ! ------------------------------------------- ! Parameter fÃ¼r JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS definieren: ! ------------------------------------------- :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "SPIEGELAPP" :SET &PARAFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.PAR" :SET &DUMPFILE# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#.DMP" :SET &EXPSCRIPT# = "&BATCH#_&ORADB#" ! ---------------------------------- :SET &LOGFILE# = "&LOGDIR#/&EXPSCRIPT#.log" :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_CREATEFOLDER !:INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_DELETEFILE "EDIZIONE" = "&EXP_PATH#/dmp/&DUMPFILE#" :INC JOBI.GETPW_DBTOOLS ! ----------------------------- ! Parameterdatei zusammenbauen: ! ----------------------------- cat << __EOF__ > &PARAFILE# TABLES=BBS.TBBVTR_T_STAT_BEW DUMPFILE=&DUMPFILE# REUSE_DUMPFILES=YES DIRECTORY=&DIRECTORY# FLASHBACK_TIME="TO_TIMESTAMP('&TS#', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')" LOGFILE=&DIRECTORY#_LOG:&EXPSCRIPT#_&TIMESTAMP_AM#.log CONTENT=DATA_ONLY QUERY=BBS.TBBVTR_T_STAT_BEW:" WHERE CREATE_DAT > (SELECT MAX(CREATE_DAT) FROM BBS.TBBVTR_T_STAT_BEW@DLLW2&IDT#.ad49.dir)" __EOF__ :INC JOBI.DBTOOLS_RUNEXPORT
